text: Morteza Haj Seyed Ahmadi (; 1 November 1924 â€“ 21 December 2014) was an Iranian actor, singer and writer. Ahmadi was known for his works in Autobus, Madrak-e Jorm and Khane-kharab. He was born in Tehran. Ahmadi died on 21 December 2014 at his private house in Tehran, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Writers from Tehran Category:Iranian singers Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Morteza Ahmadi
